name: Are You Seeing What I'm Seeing?
name_original: Are You Seeing What I'm Seeing?
description:
Three sinners, each with a uniquely fractured mind, each with a different view of the world around them. Utilize their combined abilities to solve puzzles and escape from judgement.

ControlsMoveWASDLookMouseInteract/SelectLeft ClickSwitch CharacterQPauseESC

To play, download the .zip file, extract it, and run the .exe file.

Game created by Brenden Hover (myself), Brenton Lenzen, and Christopher Staud for the Texas A&M Game Developers Spring 2020 Semester Jam, with the theme of "Alternate Perspectives".
